title: Mammoth Factory Games - Curse of the Skinwalkers
description:
Trapped and surrounded on all sides, the party must fight throughout the night against a pack of vicious lycanthropes â€“ but in truth, it is the threat from within that might lead them to ruin. Haunted pasts, conflicting agendas, and long-nursed grudges combine to fill them with doubt and mistrust. Stay on your guard and place your trust carefully if you are to have any hope of surviving the Curse of the Skinwalkers.

This module is a 5e adventure designed for a party of four to five level 5 characters, built to be plugged easily into an existing campaign or as a stand-alone adventure. The adventure is a self-contained story that combines classic horror with the mystery and paranoia of a cabin-fever tale. The characters must fight to survive against a pack of ravenous lycanthropes, while navigating the tense atmosphere that brews around them and the NPCs that populate the adventure. Haunted pasts, conflicting agendas, and long-nursed grudges combine to fill the characters with doubt and mistrust.
